flavorText:
"Who are the agents of the Dimir? No one and everyone."
—Lazav

foreignData.flavorText:
„Wer sind die Agenten von Dimir? Niemand und jeder."
—Lazav
foreignData.name: Verstärkte Überwachung
foreignData.text:
Jedes Mal, wenn du Überwachen anwendest, kannst du dir dabei zwei zusätzliche Karten ansehen.
Schicke die Verstärkte Überwachung ins Exil: Mische deinen Friedhof in deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¿Quiénes son los agentes del Gremio Dimir? Nadie y todos".
—Lazav
foreignData.name: Escrutinio mejorado
foreignData.text:
Puedes mirar dos cartas adicionales cada vez que escrutes.
Exiliar el Escrutinio mejorado: Baraja tu cementerio en tu biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Qui sont les agents de Dimir ? Personne et tout le monde. »
—Lazav
foreignData.name: Surveillance accrue
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez regarder deux cartes supplémentaires à chaque fois que vous surveillez.
Exilez la Surveillance accrue : Mélangez votre cimetière dans votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Chi sono gli agenti dei Dimir? Tutti e nessuno."
—Lazav
foreignData.name: Sorveglianza Rafforzata
foreignData.text:
Puoi guardare due carte addizionali ogni volta che sorvegli.
Esilia la Sorveglianza Rafforzata: Rimescola il tuo cimitero nel tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「ディミーアの工作員は誰か。誰でもないし、誰でもある。」
――ラザーヴ
foreignData.name: 諜報強化
foreignData.text:
あなたが行う諜報１回につき、あなたはカードを追加で２枚見てもよい。
諜報強化を追放する：あなたの墓地をあなたのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。

foreignData.name: 향상된 감시
foreignData.text:
당신은 매번 감시를 하면서 추가로 카드 두 장을 더 볼 수 있다.
향상된 감시를 추방한다: 당신의 무덤을 당신의 서고에 섞어 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Quem são os agentes dos Dimir? Todos. E ninguém."
— Lazav
foreignData.name: Vigilância Reforçada
foreignData.text:
Você pode olhar dois cards adicionais a cada vez que usar vigiar.
Exile Vigilância Reforçada: Embaralhe seu cemitério em seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Кто служит агентом у Димиров? Никто — и все».
— Лазав
foreignData.name: Усиленный Надзор
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз при использовании Слежки вы можете посмотреть две дополнительные карты.
Изгоните Усиленный Надзор: втасуйте ваше кладбище в вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.flavorText:
「谁是底密尔的密探？谁都不是，谁也都是。」
～拉札夫
foreignData.name: 多加刺探
foreignData.text:
你每次刺探可以额外检视两张牌。
放逐多加刺探：将你的坟墓场洗入你的牌库。

foreignData.flavorText:
「誰是底密爾的密探？誰都不是，誰也都是。」
～拉札夫
foreignData.name: 多加刺探
foreignData.text:
你每次刺探可以額外檢視兩張牌。
放逐多加刺探：將你的墳墓場洗入你的牌庫。

name: Enhanced Surveillance
originalText:
You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil.
Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

rulings.text: The additional cards you look at due to Enhanced Surveillance’s ability are part of what you surveil. You may put those cards into your graveyard or back on top in any order along with the others.
If you control a second Enhanced Surveillance, their effects both apply and you may look at an additional four cards. If you control a third, may look at an additional six cards, and so on.
Enhanced Surveillance’s last ability can be activated only while it’s on the battlefield.

text:
You may look at an additional two cards each time you surveil.
Exile Enhanced Surveillance: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
